item.name: Apache Clients Keepalive
item.description: Apache workers which are currently in keepalive state

item.name: Apache Clients Reader
item.description: Apache workers which are currently reading a request.

item.name: Apache Memory Average Process
item.description: Average RSS memory used by apache process

item.name: Apache Memory Biggest Process
item.description: Biggest RSS memory used by apache process

item.name: Apache Memory Smallest Process
item.description: Smallest RSS memory used by apache process

item.name: Apache Memory Total
item.description: Total RSS memory used by apache

item.name: Apache Clients ServerLimit
item.description: Total amout of possible apache workers.

item.name: Apache Clients Writer
item.description: Apache workers which are currently a request result writing to a client.

trigger.name: Apache Maxclient Usage > 80%
trigger.description: The available maxclient slots are consumed by 80% by reader/writer processes.

trigger.expression: ({Custom - Service - Apache:apache.jk.dis.last()} +{Custom - Service - Apache:apache.jk.stp.last()} ) > (({Custom - Service - Apache:apache.jk.dis.last()} + {Custom - Service - Apache:apache.jk.stp.last()} + {Custom - Service - Apache:apache.jk.act.last()}) * 0.20)
trigger.name: Apache Mod Jk Inactive Backends > 20%
Get LB_Check HTTP Local on port {$HTTP_PORT} > 30sec
trigger.description: Apache did not deliver the standard loadbalancer checkfile within 3 seconds.

dependency.name: HTTP not reachable on port {$HTTP_PORT} from localhost

trigger.name: HTTP not reachable on port {$HTTP_PORT} from localhost
trigger.description: Apache was not reachable on {$HTTP_PORT} in the last two monitoring cycles.
